title: Transportation Sentences
description: Learn A2 sentences about using transportation.

steps.pinyin: wǒ měi tiān dā gōng chē qù shàng bān.
steps.english_hint: I take the bus to work every day.

steps.teacher: 我喜歡坐地鐵，因為很快。
expected_answer: 我喜歡坐地鐵，因為很快。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xǐ huān zuò dì tiě, yīn wèi hěn kuài.
steps.english_hint: I like the metro because it's fast.

steps.teacher: 我今天要去車站接朋友。
expected_answer: 我今天要去車站接朋友。
steps.pinyin: wǒ jīn tiān yào qù chē zhàn jiē péng yǒu.
steps.english_hint: I will go to the station to pick up my friend today.

steps.teacher: 下班時間公車常常很擠。
expected_answer: 下班時間公車常常很擠。
steps.pinyin: xià bān shí jiān gōng chē cháng cháng hěn jǐ.
steps.english_hint: Buses are often crowded after work.

steps.teacher: 如果下雨，我就叫計程車。
expected_answer: 如果下雨，我就叫計程車。
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ xià yǔ, wǒ jiù jiào jì chéng chē.
steps.english_hint: If it rains, I'll call a taxi.

steps.teacher: 我明天要搭火車去外地。
expected_answer: 我明天要搭火車去外地。
steps.pinyin: wǒ míng tiān yào dā huǒ chē qù wài dì.
steps.english_hint: I'm taking a train out of town tomorrow.

steps.pinyin: wǒ cháng cháng zài chē shàng tīng yīn yuè.
steps.english_hint: I often listen to music on the bus/train.

steps.teacher: 我要轉車一次才能到公司。
expected_answer: 我要轉車一次才能到公司。
steps.pinyin: wǒ yào zhuǎn chē yí cì cái néng dào gōng sī.
steps.english_hint: I need to transfer once to get to my office.

steps.pinyin: chē piào kě yǐ yòng shǒu jī mǎi.
steps.english_hint: You can buy the ticket with your phone.

steps.teacher: 我怕坐飛機，因為太高了。
expected_answer: 我怕坐飛機，因為太高了。
steps.pinyin: wǒ pà zuò fēi jī, yīn wèi tài gāo le.
steps.english_hint: I'm afraid of flying because it's too high.
